bwwExcerpt: Comedy can be deadly. Just a few directorial misjudgments and uh-oh, sudden death: forced laughs, desperate thesps, and an aud growing surlier by the minute. Something like that has befallen the Roundabout's revival of 'Harvey,' Mary Chase's 1944 Pulitzer Prize-winning playâ€¦Jim Parsons aims to charm the pants off us by giving Elwood P.
